translations: 肌肉组织；[解剖] 肌肉系统

sentences.sentence: Breus said the bath will relax your musculature and increase your core body temperature.
sentences.translation: 布鲁斯说，洗澡能放松你的肌肉组织，增加你的核心体温。

sentences.sentence: Overzealous use of retractors can damage the skin and the musculature, as mentioned earlier.
sentences.translation: 就像早先提到的，牵开器使用过于积极可能损伤皮肤和肌肉组织。

sentences.sentence: There were anodyne moments of healing when I'd dispel my fears by looking at the musculature of my body.
sentences.translation: 注视镜子中的自己的那个时刻，我驱除了自身的恐惧，这似乎是一种缓和的镇痛剂。
